short_summary: This is a solicitation for the purchase of Symantec Support.
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of Symantec Support. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to:a. view and access solicitations from SSC;b. submit a response to a solicitation;c. receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations;d. be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments; ande. submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
duration_in_months: With regards to the second point, only suppliers who have completed the OEM Certification have been awarded contracts.
